title: Los Freddy's 1970 Lagrimas Son (ECO-969)
description:
This is very old vinyl rip of Los Freddy&#039;s 
"Lagrimas Son" LP from 1970. This LP is 
long OUT-OF-PRINT and was one of my 1st 
attempts at ripping vinyl in 1997.

Quality isn&#039;t great, my family must have 
played this LP nearly 10,000 times before
1980 (!), but it&#039;s now available to any one 
who is interested, or fondly remembers early 
late 60&#039;s and early 70&#039;s Mexican Romantica music.

By 1970, Los Freddy&#039;s had stopped covering 
American hits and began to play strictly 
Latin-penned ballads.

I believe it caused them to be front runner in a 
musical genre that eventually became called 
ROMANTICA. 

Enjoy!!

Also available are the following out-of-print
Los Freddy&#039;s LP&#039;s:

Mato Mi Corazon (1967?)
Obsesion (1968?)
Sin Tu Amor (1969?)
Lagrimas Son (1970?)
Con Tu Adios (1972)
Quiero Ser Feliz (1973)
Llegara Tu Final (1974)
Aquel Amor (1975)

If you want them...ask.
